issue.title: [CF 1573] Warrior Fury Victory Rush
issue.body:
Victory Rush always shows its ready even if it's not,  used name and spellID same issue.

 

It should only show after you kill something that gives exp/honor.

 

But it always comes up as ready.

 

Warrior Fury

 

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Icedawg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1573 | Raw

comments.body:
Are you sure you don't have Impending Victory talented?


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

I just loaded it up to be sure, No I do not have Impending Victory talented.

 

 


> Posted by CurseForge user Icedawg

You'll have to use either checking for Useability or the Victory Rush buff.

 

Just checking checking the cooldown will show it as available, despite not being useable, as it's not on cooldown.


> Posted by CurseForge user Zardilann

ohhh ok, thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Icedawg
